thread.title: Tracy Morgan, bouncing back from bad crash, returns to 'SNL'
thread.title_full: Tracy Morgan, bouncing back from bad crash, returns to 'SNL'

title: Tracy Morgan, bouncing back from bad crash, returns to 'SNL'
text:
> Entertainment Tracy Morgan, bouncing back from bad crash, returns to 'SNL' In this Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, photo, provided by NBC, actor and comedian Tracy Morgan speaks during a monologue on the show, in New York. Morgan returned to a familiar stage, hosting "Saturday Night Live" in his first appearance on the show since a vehicle crash that left him in a coma. (Dana Edelson/NBC via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
